oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Civil Defense air raid control center at YMCA, Nashville, 1954 March
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mayor Ben West and County Judge Beverly Briley with several government and military officials at the Civil Defense air raid control center at the Nashville YMCA in March 1954. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 5 photograph negatives : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West, Ben, 1911-1974; Briley, Beverly, 1914-1980
